name: Greece Defense TD
description: Greece Defense is an epic tower defense saga where you play as the general of the united Greek army and your duty is to protect your land from invasion of thousands of mythical creatures driven by mighty Titans who somehow managed to escape from Tartarus.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Service Pack 3 Processor: Dual Core CPU Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 compliant with 512MB of video RAM. DirectX: Version 9.0
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP Service Pack 3 Processor: Dual Core CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 compliant with 1GB of video RAM. DirectX: Version 9.0
